= Debuggning =

If firebug doesn't work with all the nested javascripts or if you simple want to use another debug to send messages to.. then you can use the integrated debugging functions. All messages will be written in the same window.

== Functions ==

_log_message( string )_

This function will write a message into the debug-window (open a new if none exist) and also log the date/time.


_log_variable( string, data )_

This function will write a message and/or a variable into the debug-window (open a new if none exist) and also log the date/time.The first parameter (string) is optional.. if you just want to write the contents of an object (or array etc) just send en empty string.

== Exemples ==
*Log a simple message:*
{{{
function javascript_test() {

    var error = false;
    // do some stuff

    if (error==true) {
       // if variable error is true; log a message
       log_message( 'Error; Unable to do stuff' );
    }

}
}}}

*Log a message and a variable:*
{{{
function javascript_testvar() {

    // do some stuff

    var dataDump = []; // mixed data
    dataDump[0] = 'a value';
    dataDump[1] = new Object();
    dataDump[1].hello = 'world';

    // log a message and variable data
    log_variable( 'Error; dumping data', dataDump );

}
}}}

*Log a variable_*
{{{
function javascript_testvar2(result) {

    // do some stuff

    var dataDump = new Object();
    dataDump.hello = 'world';

    if (result==undefined) {
       // if no parameter sent to function; logvariable data
       log_variable( '', dataDump );
    }

}
}}}
